alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Natchitoches; Red River; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:48PM CDT until September 07 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 448 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles east of Ringgold, or 18 miles west of Jonesboro, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Campti, Martin, Clarence, Goldonna, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Bienville, Powhatan, Grand Ecore, Brice, Friendship, Liberty Hill, Black Lake, Chestnut, Clear Lake, and Creston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
